solution_line_template: First find the total number of pieces of candy Anna gets: {anna_candy_per_house} pieces/house * {anna_num_houses} houses = {anna_total_candy} pieces

Then find the total number of pieces of candy Billy gets: {billy_candy_per_house} pieces/house * {billy_num_houses} houses = <<{billy_candy_per_house}*{billy_num_houses}={billy_total_candy}>>{billy_total_candy} pieces

Then subtract the number of pieces Billy gets from the number Anna gets to find the difference: {anna_total_candy} pieces - {billy_total_candy} pieces = <<{anna_total_candy}-{billy_total_candy}={difference}>>{difference} pieces
